experiences.description:
/ Ruby on Rails Developer
Responsibilities:
· Prepared and analyzed System Requirements Specifications (SRS) for a project and interacted with client during requirements specifications.
· Implemented and enhanced CRUD operations for the applications using the MVC (Model View Controller) architecture framework.
· Developed microservices to increase productivity, quality and security.
· Created most important Business Rules which are useful for the scope of project and needs of customers.
· Developed and tested many features for dashboard using Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap, CSS and JavaScript.
· Planned and carried out daily scrums, weekly estimations and retrospectives and pair programming.
· Followed Test Driven Development (TDD), Scrum concepts of the Agile Methodology to produce high Quality Software.
· Practiced Test-Driven Development with RSpec as well as Behavior Driven Development with Cucumber and Capybara to specify and test controller classes, models, view templates, helpers and routing.
· User Interface for website with ERB, JQuery, html, css, Ajax in Ruby on Rails Framework.
· Used Extreme Programming (XP) and Scrum practices.
· Developed ETL workflows involving Data extraction, serialization, transformations and loading into mongodb.
· Involved in creating and maintaining Database objects, Profiles and associated tablespaces, Roles and Privileges.
· Used AMQP for messaging protocol.
· Have exposer in building containers using Docker.
· Used JQuery, Angularjs, Reactjs and Ajax in web applications to enhance the customer website experience.
· Design and maintain ROR code. Implement upgrades, patches, code releases, and database changes using Mongo DB (NoSQL)
· Peer-review code to satisfy quality, stability, performance, DRY patterns and security checklist.
· Wrote ruby scripts for deployments onto AWS and Continuous Integration provisioning.
· Analyzed software requirements and provide solutions and performed analysis, design, coding, testing, implementation, and maintenance of software solutions.
Environment: Ruby 2.3 , Ruby 2.5, Rails 4.2, Rails 5.2 , HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Angular JS, ReactJS , JSON, OJ, Multi_JSON, Jquery, Rubygems, Unix/Linux, GIT/ GitHub, RSPEC, Minitest, Cucumber, Agile, AmazonEC2, MongoDB, Faraday, httparty, Actionmailer, Selenium-webdriver, Capybara, Devise, concurrent-ruby, Rubo 3T (ROBOMONGO), AMQP, Docker, Puma.
M9 Consulting Inc.
experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer

experiences.description:
Responsibilities:
• Developed web application using Ruby on Rails on Unix/Linux operating system, backed by MySQL, and PostgreSQL.
• Planned and carried out daily scrums, weekly estimations and retrospectives and pair programming.
· Involved in Software Development which is driven by Agile methodology.
• Develop user friendly and sophisticated graphical representation of the catalogue of items that would be configured for a piece of equipment.
• Design and implementation of MVC framework using technologies like JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and RUBY on RAILS.
· Upgraded associated gems, across multiple Ruby and Rails versions.
• Implemented Behavior Driven Deployment (BDD) using R spec and Cucumber to perform cross browser and regression testing.
• Execute lossless data migrations in production from a MySQL database to a redesigned PostgreSQL database.
· ETL: Data extraction, managing, aggregations and loading into Hive.
· Used Talend to perform ETL jobs.
· Implemented Big Data tools within Hadoop ecosystem (HDFS, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie).
· Created Hive External tables and loaded the data into tables and queried data using HQL that helped market analysts to look for emerging trends by comparing fresh data with EDW reference tables.
· Used Hive to analyze the partitioned and bucketed data and compute various metrics for reporting.
· Worked closely with other developers, project managers, UX designers, and marketers on agile user stories.
Environment: Ruby, Rails, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, JSON, Jquery, Rubygems, MySQL, Unix/Linux, Restful, GIT, WEBrick, RSPEC, Cucumber, Agile, AmazonEC2, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie.
experiences.title: Software Developer

experiences.description:
Responsibilities:
· Involved in various phases of Software development life cycle (SDLC) as requirement gathering, modeling, analysis, architecture design & development.
· Designed and developed web applications using Ruby, Rails, Java/J2EE design patterns, HTML, CSS, Java Script AJAX and JQuery.
· Designed and developed necessary UML Diagrams (Use Case, Class, Sequence, State).
· Responsibilities included developing new features, fixing bugs, interfacing with the product development and software quality assurance group.
· Developed custom Rails applications specific to client's unique needs.
· Database modeling and design. Involved in developing and implementation of the web application using Ruby on Rails.
· Participated in requirements definition and story carding.
· Worked extensively with arrays and hashes in the ruby environment.
· Used many regular expressions in order to match the pattern with the existing one.
· Designed, development controller and view part of the system by scaffolding.
· Understanding of how web applications work including security, session management and best development practices.
· Focus on Ruby development, both inside of a traditional Rails application, and as part of a report generating application.
· Developed the user authentication and order processing modules for customer facing application.
· Develop user friendly and sophisticated graphical representation of the catalogue of items that would be configured for a piece of equipment.
· Responsible for most view/controller changes, as well as model/database integration with other members of team.
· Developed cross-browser/platform using HTML, CSS, JQuery and JavaScript to match design specs for complex page layouts while adhering to code standards
· Deployed application and provide continuous maintenance using Git.
· Developed Session Beans to process user requests and Entity Beans to load and store information from database.
· Designed and used JUnit test cases during the development phase.
· Used Tortoise SVN for version control of the source code.
· Open source cross-platform WebTesting (WSDL) using SoapUI.
· Designed and implemented relational database, and stored procedures, views, and triggers using MS SQL server development tool.
Environment: Ruby, Rails, SQL, WEBrick, HTML, JQuery, JavaScript, CSS3, AJAX, Java, J2EE, Web Services (SOAP, WSDL, JAX-WS), Spring, Servlets, JSP, JUnit, Tortoise SVN, Log4j, PL/SQL, WebSphere
experiences.title: Senior Programmer Analyst
